remarks: Negation does not change the span of a singleton.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Apr-2014.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lspsnneg.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspsnneg.m $e |- M = ( invg ` W ) $.
lspsnneg.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspsnneg $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( N ` { ( M ` X ) } ) = ( N ` { X } ) ) $.
